name: ASAccountAuthenticationModificationUpgradePasswordToStrongPasswordRequest
desc: A request to automatically upgrade from a weak password to a strong password.

items.name: init(user: String, serviceIdentifier: ASCredentialServiceIdentifier, userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any]?)
items.desc: Creates a request to upgrade from using a weak password to using a strong system-generated password.

items.name: var user: String
items.desc: The user name of the account to upgrade.

items.name: var serviceIdentifier: ASCredentialServiceIdentifier
items.desc: An identifier that represents a particular service that the user needs a credential for, like a web site.

items.name: var userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any]?
items.desc: A dictionary that contains values to pass to your account modification extension.
